== Kallooppara (628303) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Kallooppara is a village in the [[Mallappally]] taluka of [[Pathanamthitta]] district with an area of 1690 hectares and harbouring 4561 households with total population of 16837 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Thiruvalla]] is at a distance of 8 km. Male population is 7915 and female population is 8922. Scheduled Caste Population is 1909 and Scheduled Tribes population is 50. Census Location Code of the village is 628303<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Total literate population: 15219 (90.39%)
* Literate male population: 7129 (90.07%)
* Literate female population: 8090 (90.67%)
